divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen several reports on this already. Just thought I'd add my 2 cents... Object was traveling appox north to south. Object was extremely bright. To bright for a sattelite and seemed to generate it's own source of light. Object was at approx 75-95k feet altitude. Object was moving extremely fast. Faster than any plane or sattelite I have observed. There was no sound coming from the object. Object just vanished.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Castro Valley
There were no other sightings in Castro Valley on or around May 27th 2009
